ygData.subject: Re: [Re: [EQ_women] Intro]
ygData.msgSnippet: Currently out of game, but just bumped into an old old friend and it may just be the little oomph I need to go get the last two upgrades and explore some new
ygData.messageBody:
Currently out of game, but just bumped into an old old friend and it may just
be the little "oomph" I need to go get the last two upgrades and explore some
new territory.

I have an new thread, though, because it is part of why I'm also not playing
in DAoC. I love to roleplay and have gotten my character into an engagement
to a Minstrel . Well, the problem is the Minstrel is always on and as soon as
I log in he comes and spend the whole game with me, I never get to solo
anymore, I never get to group, and he's a horrible player so I end up doing
more dying than I can stand. It's made me kind of not want to play, but I am
so bad at hurting people's feelings I don't know how to just say "Um, mind if
I solo tonight?"

Suggestions? He started an alt so he wouldn't level without me and his alt is
now level 28. I'm feeling REALLY guilty. I also have a lot more pity for
poor Sylvanar *giggles and waves to Josh*

Ice

P.S. Exercise in memory here....

Iceiallana - 54 Druid on Brell
Cerres - 33 Bard on Brell
Dnaisha - 29 Necormancer on Brell
Caedusia - 20 Cleric on Brell
Dnaice - 22 Wizard on Quellious
Lahstia - 19 Ranger on Thalux Paells (sp?)

Iceult - 18 Armswoman in Albion on Percival
Iceiallana - 12 Cleric in Albion on Percival
